Original Requirements: Create a snake game in Python
Product Goals: Ensure an engaging user experience with smooth animations
Implement responsive controls and collision detection
Provide clear instructions and visual feedback
User Stories: As a player, I want to control the snake using arrow keys
As a player, I want to see my score increase as I eat food
As a player, I want to restart the game when I lose
Competitive Analysis: Snake Game A: Simple controls and basic graphics
Snake Game B: Advanced graphics but lacks clear instructions
Snake Game C: User-friendly interface with smooth animations

Requirement Analysis: The game should be simple yet engaging with smooth animations and clear instructions.
Requirement Pool: Implement snake movement using arrow keys
Generate food at random positions on the game board
Detect collisions between the snake and boundaries or its body
Increase the length of the snake when it eats food
UI Design draft: The UI should include a grid with ASCII characters representing the snake and food. The score will be displayed at the top, and clear instructions will guide the player.
